cause.description:
Since I am amazing, I think it would make sense to help add to the amount of awesomness in the world by handing me cash, I also take donations in the form of beer and whatever else is in your secret stash
1. I will spend your money on random shit I like
2. And definitely alot of candy, and other good shit
3. Possibly delicious cuts of various meats
cause.mission: Give me random amounts of undisclosed cash
cause.name: M.E.
